<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Pillars of Knowledge](/Deities.aspx?ID=209)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Friends in High Places](/Sources.aspx?ID=30) pg. 1

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** Seek new knowledge, use your knowledge and skill to improve the world around you, protect knowledge from becoming lost

**Anathema** Choose to use old knowledge or tools after they have been improved upon, destroy knowledge, refuse to answer a query for which you know the answer

**Area of Concern**
Learning, innovation, safeguarding knowledge

**Follower Alignments**
LN, N, CN

**Pantheon Members**
[Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=286)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** none

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=28), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=26), [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=54)

- **3rd**
[Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=156)

- **7th**
[Retrocognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=260)

</column>
